title: Naihati Stadium
text: Naihati Stadium, also known as Bakimanjali Stadium, is a <a href="association%20football">football</a> stadium located in a municipality of <a href="North%2024%20Parganas">North 24 Parganas</a> district in the Indian state of West Bengal. The stadium is owned by Naihati Municipality. The stadium has a capacity of 25,000 spectators at present. The stadium has hosted games of <a href="Calcutta%20Football%20League">Calcutta Football League</a>, <a href="IFA%20Shield">IFA Shield</a> and <a href="I-League">I-League</a>.
